Package wtf.choco.arrows.crafting

Class AlchemicalCauldron

  • java.lang.Object
    • wtf.choco.arrows.crafting.AlchemicalCauldron
  • public class AlchemicalCauldron
extends Object
    Represents a special cauldron that may be used to craft AlchemicalArrows. These cauldrons require a source of heat, therefore a lit flame must be present below the cauldron before it may be used to conjure recipes.
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco

      • getHeatingStartTime

        public long getHeatingStartTime()
        Get the time in millis (according to System.currentTimeMillis()) at which this cauldron started heating up. If the cauldron is not heating up (i.e. isHeatingUp() == false), this will return -1.
        Returns:
        the heating start time. -1 if the cauldron is not heating up
